articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: The Vega rocket never found its commercial niche. After tonight, it’s gone. - Ars Technica
articles.description: The larger Vega-C will take over, primarily to launch European government satellites.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ The final Vega rocket climbs away from its launch pad in Kourou, French Guiana.
30
The final flight of Europe's Vega rocket lifted off Wednesday night from French Guiana, carrying an impor… [+5149 chars]
